docs.lead_paragraph: IN spite of the fact that almost all hospitals treat five times as many persons in their dispensaries as in their wards, we still allow the tradition of superficial, slovenly work in dispensaries to go on. We allow the great dispensary abuse -- not the abuse of the dispensaries by the patient, but the abuse of the patient by the dispensary -- to go on.
